resources.string: The private key is stored on this device. Please keep your device safe to prevent your key from being compromised.
Please take a moment to write down this seed phrase. It’s the backup for your key. This app will only show the seed phrase once.
Never share the seed phrase with anyone. Avoid having a digital copy.

Passphrase adds another layer of security to your key. You will need to enter the passphrase every time you sign using this key. You can think of it as the 25th word of your seed phrase. Passphrase is optional.

Only use this if you are an advanced user. We generally don’t recommend using passphrases in multisig wallets.

A passphrase adds another optional layer of security to your key. Note that forgetting a passphrase will render your key useless forever.
We strongly recommend adding a passphrase for your Primary Key.
Please back up your passphrase along with the seed. You will need both to recover your key.

Are you sure you don’t want a passphrase? A Primary Key without a passphrase means that your account is unprotected. Anyone who has access to your device can access all your data, including your wallets.

A Primary Key is a dual-purpose key that can be used both for account-based authentication and for signing Bitcoin transactions. \n\n A Primary Key account is an account that does not require any personal information, including email addresses.
A Primary Key must be a software key. Support for other key types coming soon.
Almost there! Now we just need to pick a username for your account.\n\nThe default username is the fingerprint (XFP) of your Primary Key. You can change this if you want to.

A Primary Key is a dual-purpose key that can be used both for account-based authentication and for signing Bitcoin transactions. A Primary Key account is an account that does not require an associated email address.\n\nWe strongly recommend enabling passphrases for Primary Keys.
Sign in to Primary Key account
Please enter the passphrase associated with the Primary Key. If you don’t have one, leave it blank.
We can’t find any account associated with this key.
You won’t be able to view the seed phrase again in the app.
" Please make sure that you have it backed up, or risk losing your funds."
My hot wallet has been recovered.
Please enter the master private key (XPRV).
